themes.name: Righteous Avoidance
themes.description: What the blessed person does not do

themes.name: Positive Devotion
themes.description: What the blessed person does instead

themes.name: Tree Imagery
themes.description: The righteous as a fruitful tree by water

themes.name: Wicked Contrast
themes.description: The fate of the wicked compared to chaff
themes.comment: Negative counterpart to the tree imagery

themes.name: Final Judgment
themes.description: The ultimate destiny of righteous and wicked

themes.name: Rebellious Coalition
themes.description: The nations and rulers conspiring against God

themes.name: Divine Anointed
themes.description: The messianic figure opposed by the nations
themes.comment: First messianic reference in the Psalter

themes.name: Revolt Against Bondage
themes.description: The rebels' attempt to throw off divine authority

themes.name: Heavenly Derision
themes.description: God's mocking response to human rebellion

themes.name: Zion Kingship
themes.description: Establishment of the king on God's holy mountain

themes.name: Divine Sonship
themes.description: The king's special relationship as God's son

themes.name: Universal Inheritance
themes.description: The nations given as royal possession

themes.name: Iron Rule
themes.description: The king's unbreakable authority over nations

themes.name: Royal Warning
themes.description: Admonition to earthly rulers to submit

themes.name: Divine Answer
themes.description: Confidence in God's responsiveness to prayer
themes.comment: Opening affirmation of God hearing prayers

themes.name: Human Folly
themes.description: Rebuke of vain and deceitful pursuits

themes.name: Sacrificial Worship
themes.description: Call to proper worship and trust

themes.name: Peaceful Trust
themes.comment: Closing promise of rest and hope

themes.name: Augustine: Ps4:5-Tears as Sacrifice
themes.description: My mother’s tears (lacrimae) watered the earth beneath her face in prayer

themes.name: Augustine: Signatum Lumen
themes.description: The light of Your face is stamped upon us, O Lord. You sealed us with the light of Your face
themes.comment: The indelible mark of divine light on the soul.

themes.name: Divine Wrath
themes.description: Appealing against God's anger and chastening

themes.name: Physical Suffering
themes.description: Bodily affliction as manifestation of distress

themes.name: Spiritual Anguish
themes.description: Deep disturbance of soul and being

themes.name: Urgent Deliverance
themes.description: Plea for God to intervene and save

themes.name: Divine Response
themes.description: Assurance of God hearing the plea

themes.name: Divine Address
themes.description: Initial invocation and personal relationship with God

themes.name: Trust and Salvation
themes.description: Expression of trust and petition for salvation

themes.name: Threat Imagery
themes.description: Violent imagery depicting danger to the psalmist

themes.name: Self-Examination
themes.description: Reflection on one's own actions and possible wrongdoing

themes.name: Retribution Principle
themes.description: Concept of reciprocal justice and repayment

themes.name: Consequences
themes.description: Potential downfall and threat from enemies

themes.name: Enemy Aggression
themes.description: Relentless pursuit and violent seizure by enemies

themes.name: Divine Intervention
themes.description: Call for God to act and request for divine exaltation

themes.name: Humiliation
themes.description: Imagery of being trampled and reduced to dust

themes.name: Divine Judgment
themes.description: God as judge of all people

themes.name: Divine Presence
themes.description: God's surrounding presence and gathered assembly

themes.name: Judicial Petition
themes.description: Request for judgment according to justice

themes.name: Divine Examination
themes.description: God's scrutiny of the inner being

themes.name: Moral Contrast
themes.description: Destruction of wickedness and preservation of the righteous

themes.name: Divine Majesty
themes.description: God's supreme glory manifest in creation

themes.name: Infant Worship
themes.description: Perfect praise from the mouths of children

themes.name: Cosmic Design
themes.description: The heavens as God's handcrafted masterpiece

themes.name: Human Significance
themes.description: God's special attention to mortal beings

themes.name: Ecological Harmony
themes.description: Wild creatures in their created order

themes.name: Doxological Conclusion
themes.description: Bookend praise echoing the opening verses

themes.name: Joyful Worship
themes.description: Expression of joy and exuberant praise

themes.name: Historical Judgment
themes.description: Urban centers judged and oblivion of the wicked

themes.name: Divine Remembrance
themes.description: Active recollection and negation of forgetfulness

themes.name: Justice for the Oppressed
themes.description: Violence remembered with focus on the vulnerable

themes.name: Personal Petition
themes.description: Cry for mercy and request for divine attention

themes.name: Divine Self-Revelation
themes.description: God making Himself known through judicial acts

themes.name: Divine Memory
themes.description: Contrast between forgetful people and remembering God

themes.name: Judicial Petition
themes.description: Call for divine intervention against human oppression
themes.comment: Urgent plea for God to arise (v1)

themes.name: Divine Governance
themes.description: Request for God to establish righteous authority

themes.name: Lament of Abandonment
themes.description: Cry over perceived divine absence in crisis

themes.name: Divine Omniscience
themes.description: God's perfect knowledge of human evil

themes.name: Protector of Vulnerable
themes.description: God as defender of orphans and poor

themes.name: Lament in Suffering
themes.description: The psalmist's cry of despair in prolonged suffering

themes.name: Divine Hiddenness
themes.description: Feeling of God's absence and unanswered prayers

themes.name: Enemy Threat
themes.description: Fear of enemy triumph and gloating
themes.comment: Enemy references escalate from line 3 to 5

themes.name: Trust Transition
themes.description: Shift from lament to confident trust
themes.comment: Pivot to trust (sperāvi) in God's mercy

themes.name: Promise of Praise
themes.comment: Threefold praise verbs: exsultō, canō, psallō

themes.name: Folly of Atheism
themes.description: Condemnation of the fool who denies God's existence

themes.name: Universal Corruption
themes.comment: All humanity is corrupt in deeds

themes.name: Universal Apostasy
themes.comment: Parallel to verse 2 emphasizing universal sin

themes.name: Oppression of the Righteous
themes.description: Warning to those who exploit God's people

themes.name: False Fear
themes.description: Contrast between godless fear and true reverence
themes.comment: Irony of fearing where no fear should exist

themes.name: Righteous Remnant
themes.description: Hope for the poor who trust in the Lord

themes.name: Augustine:  Interior vs exterior denial
themes.description: The fool says in his heart what he dares not say with his tongue
themes.comment: En. Ps. 13.2 - Interior vs exterior denial

themes.name: Penitence
themes.comment: David's confession begins with a plea for mercy (*misereor*) and acknowledges sin (*peccatum*, *iniquitas*)

themes.name: Divine Mercy
themes.comment: Mercy is rooted in God's nature (*misericordia*) and enacted through cleansing (*lava*, *deleo*)

themes.name: Purification
themes.comment: Hyssop symbolizes purification; washing metaphors (*lavabis*) transcend ritual

themes.name: Heart Transformation
themes.comment: A new heart (*cor mundum*) and spirit (*spiritum rectum*) are God's work

themes.name: True Sacrifice
themes.comment: God rejects empty sacrifices (*holocaustis*) but accepts a broken spirit (*spiritus contribulatus*)

themes.name: Restoration
themes.comment: Forgiveness restores joy (*laetitiam*) and enables teaching (*docebo*)

themes.name: Augustine: True Penance
themes.comment: Augustine emphasizes truth (*veritatem*) and humility (*humiliata*) as prerequisites for mercy

themes.name: Augustine: Hyssop of Humility
themes.comment: Hyssop cleanses because it signifies humility (*ossa humiliata*)

themes.name: Augustine: Spiritual Sacrifice
themes.comment: Rejects ritual (*holocaustis*) for inward sacrifice (*spiritus contribulatus*)

themes.name: Augustine: City of God
themes.comment: The rebuilding of Jerusalem (line 19) and altar offerings (line 20) prefigure the Church (cf. *City of God*, XVII)

themes.name: Divine Eternity
themes.description: God's existence beyond time and creation

themes.name: Covenantal Refuge
themes.description: God as protective shelter across generations

themes.name: Temporal Perspective
themes.description: Divine vs human experience of time
themes.comment: Contrast between divine and human time

themes.name: Call to Repentance
themes.description: Invitation to turn from human frailty

themes.name: Human Transience
themes.description: The fleeting nature of mortal life

themes.name: Inscrutable Judgment
themes.description: Human inability to comprehend God's ways

themes.name: Path Contrast
themes.description: Opposing ways of righteousness and wickedness

themes.name: Prayer for Guidance
themes.comment: Desire for paths aligned with God's law (v5)

themes.name: Covenantal Commitment
themes.comment: Resolution not to forsake the law (v8)

themes.name: Cry in Distress
themes.description: Initial plea to God in time of trouble
themes.comment: Opening cry that establishes the psalm's supplicatory tone

themes.name: Protection from Deceit
themes.description: Request for deliverance from dishonest speech
themes.comment: Focus on protection from verbal harm

themes.name: Punishment of Deceivers
themes.description: Rhetorical question about divine justice against liars

themes.name: Divine Arsenal
themes.description: Imagery of God's weapons against the wicked

themes.name: Exile Lament
themes.description: Expression of alienation among hostile people

themes.name: Peace-Seeker's Dilemma
themes.description: Conflict between desire for peace and experience of hatred
themes.comment: Tension between peaceful intent and hostile environment

themes.name: Unprovoked Hostility
themes.description: Experience of being attacked despite peaceful words

themes.name: Augustine: The Fire of Charity
themes.description: The desolating coals (carbonibus desolatoriis) purify like the fire of divine love

themes.name: Upward Gaze
themes.description: The psalmist lifts eyes to God in heaven, expressing dependence

themes.name: Servile Devotion
themes.description: Simile of servants’ eyes fixed on their masters’ hands
themes.comment: Metaphor for total attentiveness to divine providence

themes.name: Persistent Plea
themes.description: Unwavering focus on God 'until He has mercy'

themes.name: Social Humiliation
themes.description: Description of scorn from the arrogant
themes.comment: Opposition defined by pride vs. the psalmist’s humility

themes.name: Augustine: Eyes of the Heart
themes.description: ‘Levavi oculos’ signifies the soul’s ascent beyond bodily sight

themes.name: Human Experience
themes.comment: From sitting to rising - encompassing all of life

themes.name: Divine Scrutiny
themes.description: God's thorough examination of the individual
themes.comment: Testing and searching of the heart

themes.name: Divine Foreknowledge
themes.description: God's complete foresight of human paths
themes.comment: All ways and paths are known beforehand

themes.name: Creative Power
themes.description: God's formative action in human life

themes.name: Temporal Knowledge
themes.comment: From ancient times to the future

themes.name: Divine Knowledge
themes.description: The wonderful nature of God's understanding

themes.name: Divine Presence
themes.comment: From heaven to hell, God is present

themes.name: Human Limitation
themes.comment: Inability to escape or fully comprehend

themes.name: Omnipresence
themes.comment: From highest heaven to deepest hell

themes.name: Extreme Locations
themes.description: God's presence in the farthest places

themes.name: Divine Protection
themes.description: God's secure holding of the believer
themes.comment: Right hand as symbol of strength and protection

themes.name: Divine Illumination
themes.comment: Darkness becomes light in God's presence

themes.name: Darkness Transformed
themes.description: The overcoming of darkness by divine light
themes.comment: Night shines like day before God

themes.name: Divine Formation
themes.description: God's intimate knowledge of human development
themes.comment: From conception to birth and beyond

themes.name: Awe and Wonder
themes.comment: Fearful and wonderful works of God

themes.name: Divine Knowledge
themes.comment: Sees even unformed substance and future days

themes.name: Creative Sovereignty
themes.description: God's control over time and development
themes.comment: Forms both days and human life

themes.name: Abundant Blessing
themes.comment: Numerous as sand on the shore

themes.name: Divine Examination
themes.comment: Invitation for God to search the heart

themes.name: Eternal Guidance
themes.comment: Lead me in the way everlasting

themes.name: Heart Knowledge
themes.comment: God's complete knowledge of the heart
